title: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates with Juan Cuadrado after winning the Italian championship Serie A match between Juventus and ACF Fiorentina on Saturday, April 20, in Turin, Italy. The win makes Ronaldo the first player to win the Premier League, La Liga and Serie A. Hide Caption 1 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos New York Yankees' Austin Romine, right, is congratulated by teammates after hitting a walk off single in the 10th inning against the Kansas City Royals on Sunday, April 21, in New York. Hide Caption 2 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Canada's Denis Shapovalov returns the ball to Germany's Jan-Lennard Struff during their tennis match on day 3 of the Monte-Carlo ATP Masters Series tournament on Monday, April 15, in Monaco. Hide Caption 3 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos The team from the University of Oklahoma celebrates after winning the NCAA college women's gymnastics championship on Saturday, April 20, in Fort Worth, Texas. Hide Caption 4 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Lawrence Cherono of Kenya wins the men's race of the 123rd Boston Marathon , on Monday, April 15. Cherono beat out two-time Boston Marathon campion Lelisa Desisa of Ethiopia, at right. Hide Caption 5 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Artemi Panarin and Josh Anderson of the Columbus Blue Jackets celebrate after scoring an empty net goal in Game 4 of the First Round of the 2019 NHL Stanley Cup Playoffs against the Tampa Bay Lightning on Tuesday, April 16, in Columbus, Ohio. Columbus defeated Tampa Bay 7-3 to win the series 4-0. It was the first ever playoff series win for the Blue Jackets franchise. Hide Caption 6 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Aaron Gordon of the Orlando Magic is seen prior to Game Two of the first round of the 2019 NBA Playoffs against the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday, April 16, in Toronto. Hide Caption 7 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Yusake Legard blows water as he prepares for the Men's 50m Freestyle heats during Day Five of the British Swimming Championships on Saturday, April 20, in Glasgow. Hide Caption 8 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Pittsburgh Pirates shortstop Erik Gonzalez, left, and center fielder Starling Marte collide while chasing a fly ball against the San Francisco Giants on Friday, April 19, in Pittsburgh. Hide Caption 9 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Fans cheer on the third wave of runners at the start of the 123rd Boston Marathon on Monday, April 15, in Hopkinton, Massachusetts. Hide Caption 10 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Borna Coric of Croatia serves to Fabio Fognini of Italy in their quarterfinal match during day six of the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters on Friday, April 19, in Monte-Carlo, Monaco. Fognini would go on to defeat Rafael Nadal in the semifinals Hide Caption 11 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Darren Collison of the Indiana Pacers, left, charges into Kyrie Irving of the Boston Celtics during the first quarter on Wednesday, April 17, in Boston. Hide Caption 12 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Manchester City's Leroy Sane jumps for the ball over Tottenham Hotspur's Victor Wanyama during the English Premier League football match on Saturday, April 20, in Manchester. Hide Caption 13 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos French Yamaha rider Gregory Ortiz competes during the 42nd Le Mans 24-hour endurance moto race, on Saturday, April 20. Hide Caption 14 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Sweat drips from the nose of Spain's Rafael Nadal during his tennis match against fellow Spaniard Roberto Bautista Agut on Wednesday, April 17, in Monaco. Hide Caption 15 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Emily Davies races down the rapids during the Women's Canoe Single competition during the GB Senior and Olympic Selection Races in London on Saturday, April 20. Hide Caption 16 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Marina Mohar of Switzerland competes in the FEI Vaulting World Cup final in Saumur, France on Thursday, April 18. Hide Caption 17 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos A skier glides over a pool of a water during a waterslide contest at the Nendaz ski resort in Switzerland on Saturday, April 20. Hide Caption 18 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Brock Nelson of the New York Islanders scores on Pittsburgh Penguins goaltender Matt Murray during the first period of Game 4 of their NHL first-round playoff series in Pittsburgh on Tuesday, April 16. The Islanders won the game 3-1 , sweeping the Penguins to advance to the second round. Hide Caption 19 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos British driver Lewis Hamilton waves to fans after winning the Formula One Chinese Grand prix in Shanghai on Sunday, April 14. Hide Caption 20 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Roxanne Modafferi, right, attempts to punch Antonina Shevchenko during their Women's Flyweight bout as part of UFC Fight Night 149 at Yubileyny Sports Palace in St. Petersburg, Russia on Saturday, April 20. Hide Caption 21 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos A Las Vegas Golden Knights player takes the ice before Game 4 of a first-round Stanley Cup Playoffs matchup against the San Jose Sharks at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, on Tuesday, April 16. Hide Caption 22 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Cyclists ride past a windmill in Maastricht, Netherlands, during the Amstel Gold Cycling Race on Sunday, April 21. Hide Caption 23 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos San Diego Padres' Ian Kinsler dodges an inside pitch during the fifth inning of a baseball game against the Cincinnati Reds in San Diego on Friday, April 19. Hide Caption 24 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos UCLA gymnast Madison Kocian competes on the balance beam during the NCAA Gymnastics Championships in Fort Worth, Texas on Friday, April 19. Hide Caption 25 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Manuella Schar of Switzerland celebrates before crossing the finish line to win the Women's Wheelchair Division of the 123rd Boston Marathon on Monday, April 15. Hide Caption 26 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals, left, and Andrei Svechnikov of the Carolina Hurricanes fight during Game 3 of their first-round playoff series on Monday, April 15 at PNC Arena in Raleigh, North Carolina. Ovechkin knocked out Skevchnikov during the fight, who had to leave the game and enter the NHL's concussion protocol Hide Caption 27 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Nathanael Soulard of France competes in the 400m freestyle event during the French swimming championships in Rennes, France on Sunday, April 21. Hide Caption 28 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Sumo wrestlers take part in a "honozumo," a ceremonial sumo exhibition, on the grounds of Yasukuni Shrine in Tokyo on Monday, April 15. Some of Sumo's top wrestlers took part in the annual one-day exhibition. Hide Caption 29 of 31

Photos: What a shot! 31 amazing sports photos Shakur Stevenson, right, trades punches with Christopher Diaz during their featherweight bout at Madison Square Garden on Saturday, April 20. Stevenson won a 10-round decision. Hide Caption 30 of 31
description: Take a look at 31 amazing sports photos from April 14 to April 21.
